Reviews.Title: This phone is great!
Reviews.Author: Robert W. Murphy
Reviews.Content: Phone has sturdy (water-resistant) aluminum case. beautiful display and all around awesome phone. I use it as an AT&T; go-phone and it works great. The phone is factory unlocked with no bloatware. You will not be disappointed with this phone! I bought directly from Amazon, not vendor. I have had to many problems in the past with vendors.

Reviews.Title: Another Awesome Sony Product.
Reviews.Author: Knuckles
Reviews.Content: This phone is extremely nice. The display is gorgeous not to mention the pictures that this camera produces. I highly recommend this phone to any one looking for a high quality phone.

Reviews.Title: very nice one
Reviews.Author: joseM
Reviews.Content: Im not a fan of big phones, but this one feels nice in my hand and pocket.....super fast , easy to use...clear calls...connects fast to internet..easy to read messages and emails....the best ..water proof feature grabs everyones attention..even iphone users are impressed...im using on at&t;  without contract , it works perfectly , i recommend it to anyone looking for a fast phone

Reviews.Title: You bet!
Reviews.Author: Laoblue
Reviews.Content: Great phone!  Has a solid feel with metal-like, firm edges that don't cut into your palm like to older version.  Speaker is on the bottom, so audio is clear - unlike the older version.  The camera iawry ally good for a phone!  Once you get to know all the functions, you will be impressed!  Close-up shots are the best though.  Landscape shots suffer a little in detail when blown-up, and there is some purpling with the sunshine - maybe because of the small lense.  Great screen too, any bigger would be a pad, with vivid colors and fantastic detail.Ok, all the great things....the no-so-great...is the battery, but I don't play lots of games or watch movies, so no problem.  It wont last long if you are a heavy gamer in between texting or calls.  And come on, this is a thin phone, what can you really hope to get out of the thin battery?  Yeah, the phone is a little heavy and bulky, especially for a gal, I would think.  Also, like other phones, it can get warm to the touch after playing games, or operating the camera for a while - a nice hand warmer maybe.

Reviews.Title: wonderful phone but must find another company
Reviews.Author: Anh Nguyen
Reviews.Content: I had the same problem like " T Ekici" who commented b4. When the phone's screen freeze and turned black, i called Amazon customer service. Bc i really like Sony Z1 so I had a new phone just One day after USPS came and pick up my dead phone. After i used new phone about 35 days, it was happended again. This time, Amazon customer service told me :" the quickest way to have this issue resolved is to contact the manufacturer directly for troubleshooting....." so i must called Sony ( Thank you for all Amazon customer service help me that night, you are so nice with me also my English is so bad  .... much better than Sony customer sv a lot ....I cant return to Sony bc it was over 30 days. Now im just waiting from Sony after i sent my phone last 2 days ago by Fex ex.

Reviews.Title: Beatiful phone but had to return it
Reviews.Author: T. Ekici "Panoptican"
Reviews.Content: I bought a Sony Z1 via Amazon. within 3 hours I unpacked the phone and turned it on the phone's screen freeze and turned black. Search the issue in internet Re: frozen black screen Sony Z1. Apparently Sony z series phones already suffering from this issue. There is a software update but not clear whether it fixes the issue or not. Hence returned the product to Amazon. It was a good phone with large screen a good camera and features but frozen black screen issue is very common and apparently Sony could not fix the issue.

Reviews.Title: The best of Sony for the best of You - Excellent Phone.
Reviews.Author: H. Batra "aks316"
Reviews.Content: The best just got better. All the negatives of Sony Xperia Z has been solved in this phone. Awesome phone.
